content.rendered:
Maddie and Johnny said "I do" at The Bridge Building with a sweet summer wedding.

The festivities began with a traditional ceremony on the rooftop, followed by cocktail hour on the riverfront with delectable southern snacks like candied bacon and hot chicken sliders. Afterwards, guests headed inside to the Cumberland space for dinner and dancing.

Dinner consisted of a delicious buffet with buttermilk fried chicken, southern style green beans, four cheese macaroni, and pulled pork biscuit sliders. A southerner's dream come true!

In lieu of a band or DJ, Maddie and Johnny opted for dueling pianos for their reception entertainment. How fun!

Take a look at stunning photos from the day by Rae Marshall. See below for a list of other vendors who helped make the day so special!

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: September 10, 2016
Bride & Groom: Madalyn + Johnny
Location: The Bridge Building
Guest Count: 160
Colors: Ivory, Gray, Dusty Purple
Photographer: Rae Marshall
Cake: Brown Sugar Cakeshop
Entertainment: Dueling Pianos
Paper Goods: Wedding Paper Divas
Florist: LMA Designs
Videographer: Hitched Wedding Cinema
Linens: Liberty Party Rental
Catering & Bar: The Bridge Building
Production Design: Nashville Lighting & Production
Planning: Brittany S. | IH

excerpt.rendered: Maddie and Johnny say, “I Do,” at The Bridge Building Event Spaces.
